_meanings:
<ab>N.</ab> of
Durgā or Pārvatī; Kālidāsa thus
accounts for the name:  
--{#svayaMviSIrRadrumaparRavfttitA parA hi kAzWA tapasastayA punaH .#}
{#tadapyapAkIrRamiti priyaMvadAM vadaMtyaparRoti ca tAM#}
{#purAvidaH#} <ls>Ku. 5. 28</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Śiva P.</ls> {#caturTe#}
{#tyaktaparRA ca aparRAKyAmavApa sA#}.
